# capstone-bbo
Bayesian Optimisation implementation for the BBO Capstone. Optimising synthetic black-box functions using Gaussian Processes (scikit-learn). Features an evolving strategy moving from Random Search to Matern/RBF Kernels with WhiteKernel noise modeling to handle stochastic, synthetic objectives.

**[Project Datasheet](./DATASHEET.md)** Datasheet for BBO Capstone Project Data Set
